Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The present study was designed to investigate the cardioprotective effects of betaine on acute myocardial ischemia induced experimentally in rats focusing on regulation of signal transducer and activator of transcription 3 ( STAT3 ) and apoptotic pathways as the potential mechanism underlying the drug effect .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| acute myocardial ischemia |

The disease entity in the given paragraph is "acute myocardial ischemia". It is a condition where blood flow to the heart is obstructed, leading to damage or death of the heart muscle.

Paragraph: The present study was designed to investigate the cardioprotective effects of betaine on acute myocardial ischemia induced experimentally in rats focusing on regulation of signal transducer and activator of transcription 3 ( STAT3 ) and apoptotic pathways as the potential mechanism underlying the drug effect .

In the given paragraph, the chemical entity is "betaine". It is a naturally occurring substance in some foods and is also available as a dietary supplement. In this study, betaine is being investigated for its potential cardioprotective effects on acute myocardial ischemia in rats.
